content: do not worry if your leopard is looking like a lizard now that will be fixed with ears and some stiches later fig 31 fig 30 9 lazy leopard crochet pattern eraitoharju © 2015 body 23 make a 43 this will be the starting point of a back leg 35 make a seven and attach it from two sides to the body but not to the seven made in step 33 fig 44 this will be the starting point of the other back leg top view of the leopard now in fig 45 fig 43 fig 44 fig 45 12 lazy leopard crochet pattern eraitoharju © 2015 36 make a five and attach it to the tail motif from two sides leave one side free
